item.title: Spam Text Classification with RNNs
item.description: By Justin Ledford, Luke Wood, Traian Pop Business Understanding Data Background SMS messages play a huge role in a person’s life, and the confidentiality and integrity of said messages are of the highest priority to mobile carriers around the world. Due to this fact, many unlawful individuals and groups try and take advantage of the average consumer by flooding their inbox with spam, and while the majority of people successfully avoid it, there are people out there affected negatively by falling for false messages.
